review: My Fire TV Stick just arrived yesterday and so far it's great!  Easy to set up - I needed to switch to another account to utilize the household Prime membership and that was simple, easy to link accounts - just have your log ins ready, and lots of apps available, including HBO Now!The one thing I wish was different was the lenght of the power cable.I purchased this on a Friday and on Monday the Fire TV Stick went on sale for $5.00 less than my purchase price.  I contacted customer service and Amazon even refunded that five bucks back to me!So far I'm very happy with this product.
